  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
  <title>Hout Bay Barber Shop</title>

  <style>
    :root {
      --primary-color: #0a0a0a;
      --accent-red: #d62828;
      --accent-blue: #0077c2;
      --text-color: #111;
      --bg-color: #fff;
      --light-gray: #f8f9fa;
      --red-hover: #b31e1e;
      --blue-hover: #005a9e;
      --shadow-light: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
      --shadow-medium: 0 4px 16px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
      --shadow-heavy: 0 8px 32px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
      --transition-smooth: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
      --border-radius: 12px;
    }

    * {
      box-sizing: border-box;
      margin: 0;
      padding: 0;
    }

    body {
      font-family: 'Inter', 'Segoe UI', system-ui, -apple-system, sans-serif;
      background-color: var(--bg-color);
      color: var(--text-color);
      line-height: 1.7;
      font-weight: 400;
    }

    header {
      background: linear-gradient(rgba(0,0,0,0.7), rgba(0,0,0,0.5)),
      url('https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1503951914875-452162b0f3f1?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1200&q=80') center/cover fixed;
      color: #fff;
      padding: 80px 20px;
      text-align: center;
      position: relative;
      min-height: 400px;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      justify-content: center;
      align-items: center;
    }

    header::before {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      inset: 0;
      background: url('data:image/svg+xml,<svg width="40" height="40" viewBox="0 0 40 40" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><defs><pattern id="barberpole" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="40" height="40"><rect width="40" height="40" fill="none"/><path d="M0 40L40 0H20L0 20M40 20L20 40H40V20Z" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.02)"/></pattern></defs><rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="url(%23barberpole)"/></svg>') repeat;
      pointer-events: none;
      z-index: 1;
    }

    header h1 {
      font-size: 3.5em;
      font-weight: bold;
      margin-bottom: 15px;
      text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.8);
      z-index: 2;
      letter-spacing: 2px;
      position: relative;
      color: #fff;
    }

    header h1::after {
      content: "✂";
      display: block;
      font-size: 0.4em;
      margin-top: 10px;
      color: var(--accent-red);
      text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.8);
    }

    header p {
      font-size: 1.3em;
      opacity: 0.95;
      text-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.8);
      z-index: 2;
      font-weight: 300;
      letter-spacing: 1px;
      position: relative;
    }

    nav {
      display: flex;
      justify-content: center;
      gap: 40px;
      padding: 18px;
      background-color: var(--primary-color);
      position: sticky;
      top: 0;
      z-index: 10;
    }

    nav a {
      color: #fff;
      text-decoration: none;
      font-weight: 500;
      transition: color 0.2s ease;
    }

    nav a:hover {
      color: var(--accent-red);
    }

    /* Enhanced Intro Section */
    .intro-section {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      flex-wrap: wrap;
      gap: 60px;
      padding: 80px 20px;
      max-width: 1200px;
      margin: 0 auto;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(214,40,40,0.02), rgba(0,119,194,0.02));
      border-radius: var(--border-radius);
      margin-top: 40px;
      box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
    }

    .intro-section img {
      width: 100%;
      max-width: 450px;
      border-radius: var(--border-radius);
      box-shadow: var(--shadow-heavy);
      transition: var(--transition-smooth);
      filter: brightness(1.05) contrast(1.1);
    }

    .intro-section img:hover {
      transform: scale(1.02) rotateY(5deg);
      box-shadow: 0 12px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
    }

    .intro-text {
      flex: 1;
      min-width: 300px;
    }

    .intro-text h2 {
      font-size: 2.8em;
      margin-bottom: 20px;
      font-weight: 700;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--accent-red), var(--accent-blue));
      background-clip: text;
      -webkit-background-clip: text;
      color: transparent;
    }

    .intro-text p {
      font-size: 1.2em;
      margin-bottom: 30px;
      color: #555;
      line-height: 1.8;
    }

    /* Premium Button Styling */
    .btn {
      display: inline-block;
      padding: 16px 32px;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--accent-red), var(--red-hover));
      color: white;
      border: none;
      border-radius: 30px;
      text-decoration: none;
      font-size: 1.1em;
      font-weight: 600;
      margin-top: 20px;
      transition: var(--transition-smooth);
      position: relative;
      overflow: hidden;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 1px;
      box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
    }

    .btn::before {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      top: 0;
      left: -100%;
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--accent-blue), var(--blue-hover));
      transition: var(--transition-smooth);
      z-index: -1;
    }

    .btn:hover::before {
      left: 0;
    }

    .btn:hover {
      transform: translateY(-3px);
      box-shadow: 0 6px 15px rgba(214,40,40,0.2);
    }

    .btn-blue {
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--accent-blue), var(--blue-hover));
    }

    .btn-blue::before {
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--accent-red), var(--red-hover));
    }

    .btn-blue:hover {
      box-shadow: 0 6px 15px rgba(0,119,194,0.2);
    }

    /* Content Sections */
    .content {
      padding: 80px 20px;
      max-width: 1200px;
      margin: auto;
    }

    .section-title {
      font-size: 2.8em;
      font-weight: 800;
      margin-bottom: 50px;
      color: var(--primary-color);
      text-align: center;
      position: relative;
    }

    .section-title::after {
      content: "";
      width: 80px;
      height: 5px;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--accent-red), var(--accent-blue));
      display: block;
      margin: 20px auto 0;
      border-radius: 3px;
    }

    /* Enhanced Services Section */
    .services {
      background: var(--light-gray);
      padding: 40px;
      border-radius: 12px;
      margin-bottom: 60px;
      box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
    }

    .services-grid {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
      gap: 30px;
    }

    .image-card {
      background-size: cover;
      background-position: center;
      border-radius: var(--border-radius);
      color: #fff;
      height: 280px;
      overflow: hidden;
      padding: 30px;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      justify-content: flex-end;
      text-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.9);
      box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
      position: relative;
      transition: var(--transition-smooth);
      border: 3px solid transparent;
    }

    .image-card::before {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      inset: 0;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(214,40,40,0.6), rgba(0,119,194,0.4));
      z-index: 1;
      transition: var(--transition-smooth);
    }

    .image-card:nth-child(even)::before {
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(0,119,194,0.6), rgba(214,40,40,0.4));
    }

    .image-card * {
      position: relative;
      z-index: 2;
    }

    .image-card:hover {
      transform: translateY(-5px) scale(1.02);
      box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
      border-color: var(--accent-red);
    }

    .image-card:nth-child(even):hover {
      border-color: var(--accent-blue);
    }

    .image-card h3 {
      font-size: 1.4em;
      margin-bottom: 8px;
      color: var(--accent-blue);
    }

    .image-card p {
      font-size: 1em;
      margin-bottom: 5px;
    }

    .image-card h3 {
      font-size: 1.8em;
      margin-bottom: 15px;
      color: #fff;
      font-weight: 700;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 2px;
    }

    .image-card p {
      font-size: 1.1em;
      margin-bottom: 8px;
      font-weight: 500;
    }

    .combo-card {
      grid-column: 1 / -1;
      justify-self: center;
      text-align: center;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, #e3f2fd, rgba(0,119,194,0.1));
      border: 3px solid var(--accent-blue);
      padding: 40px;
      border-radius: var(--border-radius);
      max-width: 500px;
      box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
      transition: var(--transition-smooth);
      position: relative;
      overflow: hidden;
    }

    .combo-card::before {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      top: -50%;
      left: -50%;
      width: 200%;
      height: 200%;
      background: linear-gradient(45deg, transparent, rgba(0,119,194,0.1), transparent);
      animation: shine 3s ease-in-out infinite;
    }

    @keyframes shine {
      0% { transform: translateX(-100%) translateY(-100%) rotate(45deg); }
      50% { transform: translateX(100%) translateY(100%) rotate(45deg); }
      100% { transform: translateX(-100%) translateY(-100%) rotate(45deg); }
    }

    .combo-card:hover {
      transform: scale(1.03);
    }

    .combo-card h3 {
      color: var(--accent-blue);
      font-size: 1.8em;
      margin-bottom: 15px;
      font-weight: 700;
    }

    .combo-services {
      margin: 15px 0;
      text-align: left;
    }

    .combo-services p {
      margin: 8px 0;
      font-size: 1.05em;
      color: #555;
    }

    .combo-pricing-section {
      margin-top: 20px;
      padding-top: 15px;
      border-top: 1px solid rgba(0,119,194,0.3);
    }

    .combo-price {
      font-size: 1.3em;
      margin-bottom: 8px;
      color: var(--accent-blue);
      font-weight: 600;
    
    }

    .combo-savings {
      font-size: 0.95em;
      color: #777;
    }

    /* Enhanced Hours Table */
    .hours-table {
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--light-gray), rgba(0,119,194,0.03));
      padding: 40px;
      border-radius: var(--border-radius);
      max-width: 500px;
      margin: 60px auto;
      box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
      text-align: center;
      border: 2px solid rgba(0,119,194,0.2);
      transition: var(--transition-smooth);
    }

    .hours-table:hover {
      transform: translateY(-3px);
      box-shadow: var(--shadow-heavy);
    }

    .hours-table h3 {
      color: var(--accent-blue);
      font-size: 1.8em;
      font-weight: 700;
      margin-bottom: 20px;
    }

    .hours-table table {
      width: 100%;
      margin-top: 20px;
      border-collapse: collapse;
    }

    .hours-table td {
      padding: 12px 0;
      border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(214,40,40,0.1);
      font-weight: 500;
      transition: var(--transition-smooth);
    }

    .hours-table tr:hover td {
      background: rgba(214,40,40,0.05);
      color: var(--accent-red);
    }

    .hours-table td:first-child {
      font-weight: 600;
      color: var(--accent-blue);
    }

    /* Professional Gallery */
    .gallery-images,
    .inside-shop-images {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
      gap: 30px;
      margin-top: 40px;
    }

    .gallery-images img,
    .inside-shop-images img {
      width: 100%;
      height: 280px;
      object-fit: cover;
      border-radius: var(--border-radius);
      transition: var(--transition-smooth);
      cursor: pointer;
      box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
      filter: brightness(1.05) contrast(1.1);
      border: 3px solid transparent;
    }

    .gallery-images img:hover,
    .inside-shop-images img:hover {
      transform: translateY(-5px) scale(1.03);
      box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
      filter: brightness(1.05) contrast(1.05);
    }

    .gallery-images img:nth-child(odd):hover {
      border-color: var(--accent-red);
    }

    .gallery-images img:nth-child(even):hover {
      border-color: var(--accent-blue);
    }

    /* Contact and Book Sections */
    #contact,
    #book {
      text-align: center;
      margin-top: 60px;
      padding: 60px 40px;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(214,40,40,0.02), rgba(0,119,194,0.02));
      border-radius: var(--border-radius);
      box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
    }

    #contact p {
      font-size: 1.2em;
      margin-bottom: 15px;
      color: #555;
    }

    #contact strong {
      color: var(--accent-blue);
    }

    /* Enhanced Footer */
    footer {
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), rgba(214,40,40,0.1));
      color: #fff;
      text-align: center;
      padding: 60px 20px;
      margin-top: 80px;
    }

    /* Premium Fixed Book Button */
    .book-btn-fixed {
      position: fixed;
      bottom: 30px;
      left: 30px;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--accent-red), var(--red-hover));
      color: #fff;
      padding: 18px 28px;
      border-radius: 50px;
      text-decoration: none;
      font-weight: 700;
      font-size: 1.1em;
      box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(214,40,40,0.4);
      transition: var(--transition-smooth);
      z-index: 1000;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 1px;
      border: 3px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
      backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
    }

    .book-btn-fixed:hover {
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--accent-blue), var(--blue-hover));
      transform: translateY(-5px) scale(1.05);
      box-shadow: 0 15px 35px rgba(0,119,194,0.5);
      border-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.4);
    }

    .book-btn-fixed::before {
      content: "📞";
      margin-right: 8px;
      font-size: 1.2em;
    }

    .book-btn-fixed::before {
      content: "📞";
      margin-right: 8px;
      font-size: 1.2em;
    }

    /* Responsive Design */
    @media (max-width: 768px) {
      header {
        padding: 80px 20px;
        min-height: 400px;
        background-attachment: scroll;
      }
      
      header h1 {
        font-size: 3em;
      }
      
      header p {
        font-size: 1.2em;
      }
      
      nav {
        gap: 20px;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        padding: 15px;
      }
      
      nav a {
        padding: 10px 20px;
        font-size: 1em;
      }
      
      .intro-section {
        gap: 40px;
        padding: 60px 20px;
      }
      
      .services {
        padding: 40px 20px;
      }
      
      .services-grid {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
        gap: 20px;
      }
      
      .book-btn-fixed {
        bottom: 20px;
        left: 20px;
        padding: 15px 22px;
        font-size: 1em;
      }
      
      .section-title {
        font-size: 2.2em;
      }
    }

    @media (max-width: 480px) {
      header h1 {
        font-size: 2.5em;
      }
      
      .intro-text h2 {
        font-size: 2.2em;
      }
      
      .gallery-images,
      .inside-shop-images {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
      }
    }
  </style>
<script type="text/javascript" src="https://replit.com/public/js/beacon.js"></script></head><div id="eruda" style="all: initial;"></div><div class="__chobitsu-hide__" style="all: initial;"></div>
<body>

<header>
  <h1>Hout Bay Barber Shop</h1>
  <p>Professional Hair Care for the Whole Family</p>
</header>

<nav>
  <a href="#services">Services</a>
  <a href="#gallery">Gallery</a>
  <a href="#inside-shop">Inside</a>
  <a href="#contact">Contact</a>
  <a href="#book">Book</a>
</nav>

<div class="intro-section">
  <img src="123046881_708501033111373_2269240271182300020_n.jpg" alt="Professional Barber Shop">
  <div class="intro-text">
    <h2>Welcome to Hout Bay Barber Shop</h2>
    <p>We are a barber shop situated in Hout Bay. We offer professional service at fair prices with modern styling and expert cuts for the whole family.</p>
    <a class="btn" href="#book">Book an Appointment</a>
  </div>
</div>

<div class="content">

  <section id="services" class="services">
    <h2 class="section-title">Price List</h2>
    <div class="services-grid">
